title: Draw Conclusions about Continued Water Use

content.prompt: If the trend in total water withdrawal represented in the graph continues, which of the following is most likely to happen in the future?

choices.label: Use of groundwater resources will replace surface water resource use.
Most countries will switch to desalination as a source of freshwater.
An increased reliance on groundwater resources to meet demand will cause the water table to rise in regions worldwide.
Aquifers will be depleted if demand is higher than recharge rate.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
